thread.title: Apple unveils bigger iPad, revamped online video box for TV
thread.title_full: Apple unveils bigger iPad, revamped online video box for TV

title: Apple unveils bigger iPad, revamped online video box for TV
text:
Topix › Science / Technology › Apple unveils bigger iPad, revamped o... Apple unveils bigger iPad, revamped online video box for TV Next Story Prev Story 1 hr ago Read more: WTNH 
Apple is releasing its largest iPad yet and a long-awaited overhaul of its online video box for TVs in an attempt to upstage various rivals that already have been making similar devices. The new tablet unveiled in San Francisco on Wednesday is called the iPad Pro. Start the conversation, or Read more at WTNH.
